title: Pan-Seared Pork Chops
description: Pan-Seared Pork Chops - Kenji López-Alt tested
steps: Remove chops from fridge 30 minutes before. Pat very dry.
Season generously with salt and pepper.
Heat oil in cast iron over medium-high until smoking.
Sear without moving 4 minutes until deep golden.
Check temp: 140°F for slightly pink, 145°F for medium.
